title: Very bad experience
text: Hi,I just want that you know about this hotel never take my reservation, and they have no trace of these email. After, they make a mistake with my credit card and request me to pay the room, it was already paid. And when I give them my laggage, they was mixed between the ground floor and my futur room.I can justified every thing, see the echange of mail with them, and I have receive of them for the mistake on my credit card.Can you take care to mention it on your web site.thank you.
